[ Module Hierarchy | Class Hierarchy ]

Module Hierarchy

  • xappy: Xappy.
    • xappy._checkxapian: _checkxapian.py: Check the version of xapian used.
    • xappy.datastructures: datastructures.py: Datastructures for search engine core.
    • xappy.errors: errors.py: Exceptions for the search engine core.
    • xappy.fieldactions: fieldactions.py: Definitions and implementations of field actions.
    • xappy.fieldmappings: fieldmappings.py: Mappings from field names to term prefixes, etc.
    • xappy.highlight: highlight.py: Highlight and summarise text.
    • xappy.indexerconnection: indexerconnection.py: A connection to the search engine for indexing.
    • xappy.marshall: marshall.py: Marshal values into strings
    • xappy.memutils: memutils.py: Memory handling utilities.
    • xappy.parsedate: parsedate.py: Parse date strings.
    • xappy.replaylog: replaylog.py: Log all xapian calls to a file, so that they can be replayed.
    • xappy.schema: schema.py: xdefinitions and implementations of field actions.
    • xappy.searchconnection: searchconnection.py: A connection to the search engine for searching.
